title: Happy Birthday Jared Benson
content:
Hey congrats!   
Those are the shrooms that make the type go large.
author: kennmunk

comments.content:
Best wishes for a terrific birthday, Jared!   
   
Typographically yours,   
   
Dylan

Happy Birthday Jared! Free subs all around :D   
   
Whoops . . . Other Jared . . .   
   
:D
Happy Birthday! Have a great day.

Happy birthday!   
   
Thanks so much for giving us all Typophile. It's a great service to the community.   
   
Cheers,   
   
T

Happy Birthday Jared! Have a nice day!   
Best Regards to Typophile teem.

Happy Birthday from Germany, Jared. Typophile is a blessing. But i can't imagine the "Pink Ketchup Boys" to be from Germany. Have to be from Austria (At least I hope so for all the German stand owners).   
But the stand's design is very, ahh..., nice.   
   
Servus   
   
Dominik

Hope you had a great birthday, Jared!   
   
Ricardo

Nice shirt. :-)   
   
A {belated} happy birthday to you, Jared!
This is what happens when I don't check this area of the forum for a couple of weeks... happy belated birthday, Jared! Thanks as always for the greatness you provide here.
